snippet: John Mayer’s “Born and Raised” topped the Billboard album chart for a second week, but that was not a huge accomplishment since sales were anemic all around.
lead_paragraph: John Mayer’s “Born and Raised” topped the Billboard album chart for a second week, but that was not a huge accomplishment since sales were anemic all around.

headline.print_headline: Mayer Keeps Top Spot On Album Chart
headline.main: Mayer Keeps Top Spot on Album Chart
